name: Math Game (itch) (Amauri)
description:
Description

During my graduation, I thought that a game where teaching math would be a good idea for a TCC(Completion of course work in brazil), while developing it I realized that it was not as good an idea as I thought and that I still lack a lot of knowledge in other areas like sound, and art that in fact are not my areas.

Now it's just a game prototype created and sitting in the "drawer"

Gameplay

You can choose between four operations, addition, subtraction, multiplication and division (not yet implemented) and three levels of difficulty. With a certain time to respond to the operation.
